summary: WHEN A MODERATE LEFT TURN WAS MADE, THERE WAS A RUBBING NOISE HEARD.  LATER, AS THE VEHICLE MADE ANOTHER LEFT TURN, THERE WAS A LOUD POP/BANG HEARD, AND THE VEHICLE SUDDENLY VEERED SHARPLY INTO A HARD LEFT TURN.  THE VEHICLE HIT A CONCRETE BASE.  A FRONT END SPECIALIST STATED THAT THE STEERING RACK AND PINION HAD BROKEN.  SCC  *JB. SEE 10014911 FOR MORE DETAILS.  *AK
